about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Developer passionate about building innovative and functional web solutions
paragraphs: I'm a Full Stack Developer with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. I take a practical and direct approach to software development, focusing on writing clean, modular, and maintainable code.
I'm constantly evolving, seeking technical improvement through continuous study of new technologies, tools, and architectural patterns.
Learning is part of the process — evolving is part of the job.
